title: The restitvtion of reprobates.
author: Eleanor, Lady, d. 1652.
notes: Attributed to Lady Eleanor Douglas. cf. NUC pre-1956.
"A generall pardon for reprobate rebels" p. 3.
reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "by [illegible] Lady Davis"; and "July 23 London".
